pages.title: Quartz
pages.text: You cannot visit Nether anymore, but you still need some Quartz for Electronics? Not a problem! Now you can find in TFC Overworld $(thing)Quartz Geodes$(), which can contain $(thing)Quartz Blocks$() and $(thing)Quartz Clusters$()!
